faq.heading: Common Questions About AI Object Removal
faq.description: Find out more about our powerful photo editing features

items.title: What unwanted elements can I remove?
items.description: Our AI is capable of eliminating various distractions such as people, text, watermarks, logos, and objects like trash cans or shadows. It intelligently fills in the background to ensure a seamless look.

items.title: Is there a cost to use the AI?
items.description: Absolutely! You get 30 free credits each day which allows you to process numerous images. You can also gain more credits through daily challenges or community engagement on Discord. Subscription plans are available for higher volume needs.

items.title: Can I use edited images for commercial projects?
items.description: Yes, subscribers can utilize their edited content for commercial endeavors. Free users may only use the content for personal purposes. Please refer to our Terms of Service for more details.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All processing is done directly in your browser, meaning your photos never leave your device. This ensures complete privacy and security. Closing the tab clears all processing data immediately.

footer.heading: Transform Your Photos Today!
footer.description: Experience the benefits of our AI object removal feature. No signup needed to get started.
